mapper.select: select distinct mypage.name, mypage.member_idx, mypage.profile_img from mypage inner join mars_ff on (mypage.member_idx=mars_ff.user2_idx and mars_ff.user1_idx=#{user1_idx} and mars_ff.black_state=0) or (mypage.member_idx=mars_ff.user1_idx and mars_ff.user2_idx=#{user2_idx} and mars_ff.black_state=1)
select mypage.name, mypage.member_idx, mypage.profile_img from mypage inner join mars_ff on mypage.member_idx=mars_ff.user1_idx and mars_ff.user2_idx=#{user2_idx} and mars_ff.black_state=0
select mypage.name, mypage.member_idx, mypage.profile_img from mypage inner join mars_ff on mypage.member_idx=mars_ff.user1_idx and mars_ff.user2_idx=#{user2_idx} and black_state='1'

select distinct mypage.name, mypage.member_idx, mypage.profile_img from mypage inner join mars_ff on mypage.name=#{search_name} and mypage.member_idx in (select user2_idx from mars_ff where mars_ff.user1_idx=#{member_idx})
mapper.delete: delete mars_ff where user1_idx=#{user1_idx} and user2_idx=#{user2_idx}
mapper.update: update mars_ff set black_state=0 where user1_idx=#{user2_idx} and user2_idx=#{user1_idx}
